item.description:
UPDATE: Please let me know your phone number, we may switch the location depending on snow conditions.

Lets get some early season riding in. We will go to either Attitash or Wildcat depending on snow conditions. Wildcat is at a higher elevation so if we have natural snow that will be the choice. Attitash has an awesome snowmaking. I will decide when we get closer to the date.

If we get enough people we will break into two groups with a more advanced group going fast, there will be limited terrain available anyway. At 1pm we will meet in the lodge for lunch and at 3:30pm for apres-ski at the bar.

Both are about a 3 hour drive from Boston. I will already be in NH (so no carpool from me)but hopefully we can get some carpoolers from the Boston area.
item.name: Early Season Snowboarding in NH
